price: 26. Waxaa la yidhi: Gal jannada. Wuxuu yidhi: Alla dadkaygu may ogaadaan4.
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: 4. Ninkaa waxaa la odhan jirey Xabiib oo ahaa geed qore, sidaas darteed baa waxaa loo yiqiin Xabiib Al-Najjaar. Inta aysan nafta ka bixin waxaa soo degay malaa’ig ugu bishaaraysay in loo dhaafay dhammaan dunuubtiisa oo uu geli doono Jannada. Magaaladaas waxay ahayd Antaakiya.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
